name: One Button - James
description:
Major Studio project 2 - Online Multiplayer Demo

prompt: one button

hold [SpaceBar] to charge: fully charging can deal 2 damage, 1 damage otherwise.

tap [SpaceBar] to parry: nullify all damage.

not holding [SpaceBar] to defend: decrease damage received by 1

Each input will capture a screeshot of your camera and your opponent will see your face.

I tried to create an interesting 1 vs 1 multiplayer game in this pandemic time. Originally I wanted to stream the webcam but the free server I use doesn't support that. Some interesting experiments are first, only your opponent can clearly tell if your attack is fully charged, you can only guess it by the slight screen shake when you charge; also you cannot see your own health. Hopefully these hiding of information will form a stronger connection between the two players, and have a fun time reading each other faces.
